titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Wyandot Baseball Club of Flatlands Neck minute book and membership roll 1977.189
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-10T10:42-0500

did.unittitle: Wyandot Baseball Club of Flatlands Neck minute book and membership roll

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Wyandot Baseball Club of Flatlands Neck (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.).

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Wyandot Baseball Club of Flatlands Neck was established in the town of Flatlands in Kings County in 1859 for the purpose of organizing recreational baseball games with other baseball clubs in nearby towns.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a minute book of the Wyandot Baseball Club of Flatlands Neck in Brooklyn for the period 1859 to 1866. The book includes minutes from the Club's meetings, membership and attendance lists, scores and statistics from games played, a draft of a speech, clippings, and various notes. Also included is a loose undated membership roll marking each members' attendance at meetings throughout the year.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Wyandot Baseball Club of Flatlands Neck minute book and membership roll, 1977.189, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.
